dish_description: Juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles on a sesame seed bun
Grilled beef patty with crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, BBQ sauce, and onion rings on a brioche bun
Beef patty topped with sautéed mushrooms, Swiss cheese, lettuce, and mayo on a toasted bun
Beef patty with pepper jack cheese, jalapenos, chipotle mayo, lettuce, and tomato on a jalapeno cheddar bun
Grilled turkey patty with avocado, sprouts, tomato, and herb mayo on a whole wheat bun
House-made veggie patty with lettuce, tomato, red onion, and avocado on a multigrain bun
Two beef patties with crispy bacon, American cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce on a sesame seed bun
Grilled chicken or beef patty with teriyaki sauce, grilled pineapple, lettuce, and Swiss cheese on a Hawaiian bun
Beef patty with buffalo sauce, blue cheese crumbles, lettuce, tomato, and ranch dressing on a pretzel bun
Grilled portobello mushroom cap topped with roasted red peppers, spinach, goat cheese, and balsamic glaze on a ciabatta bun
